016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.SumFormulaParser;
019import java.util.HashMap;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Arrays;
022import java.util.HashSet;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import static java.util.Map.entry;
026import org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser.BaseParserEventHandler;
027import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
028
029/**
030 * Lookup class for lipid classes, consisting of {@link LipidClassMeta} entries,
031 * derived from lipid-list.csv.
032 *
033 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
034 * @author Nils Hoffmann
035 */
036public final class LipidClasses extends ArrayList<LipidClassMeta> {
037
038    private static final LipidClasses LIPID_CLASSES = new LipidClasses();
039    public static final int UNDEFINED_CLASS = 0;
040
041    private LipidClasses() {
042        super();
043        loadData(StringFunctions.getResourceAsStringList(new ClassPathResource("lipid-list.csv")), new SumFormulaParser());
044    }
045
046    private void loadData(List<String> lines, SumFormulaParser sfp) {
047        add(new LipidClassMeta(LipidCategory.NO_CATEGORY,
048                "UNDEFINED",
049                "",
050                0,
051                0,
052                new HashSet<>(),
053                new ElementTable(),
054                new ArrayList<>(Arrays.asList("UNDEFINED"))
055        ));
056
057        int lineCounter = 0;
058        int SYNONYM_START_INDEX = 7;
059
060        HashMap<String, ArrayList<String>> data = new HashMap<>();
061        HashSet<String> keys = new HashSet<>();
062        Map<String, Integer> enum_names = new HashMap<>(Map.ofEntries(
063                entry("GL", 1),
064                entry("GP", 1),
065                entry("SP", 1),
066                entry("ST", 1),
067                entry("FA", 1),
068                entry("PK", 1),
069                entry("SL", 1),
070                entry("UNDEFINED", 1)
071        ));
072
073        Map<String, LipidCategory> names_to_category = Map.ofEntries(
074                entry("GL", LipidCategory.GL),
075                entry("GP", LipidCategory.GP),
076                entry("SP", LipidCategory.SP),
077                entry("ST", LipidCategory.ST),
078                entry("FA", LipidCategory.FA),
079                entry("PK", LipidCategory.PK),
080                entry("SL", LipidCategory.SL),
081                entry("UNDEFINED", LipidCategory.UNDEFINED)
082        );
083
084        for (String line : lines) {
085            if (lineCounter++ == 0) {
086                continue;
087            }
088            ArrayList<String> tokens = StringFunctions.splitString(line, ',', '"', true);
089
090            if (keys.contains(tokens.get(0))) {
091                throw new ConstraintViolationException("Error: lipid name '" + tokens.get(0) + "' occurs multiple times in the lipid list.");
092            }
093            keys.add(tokens.get(0));
094
095            for (int i = SYNONYM_START_INDEX; i < tokens.size(); ++i) {
096                String test_lipid_name = tokens.get(i);
097                if (test_lipid_name.length() == 0) {
098                    continue;
099                }
100                if (keys.contains(test_lipid_name)) {
101                    throw new ConstraintViolationException("Error: lipid name '" + test_lipid_name + "' occurs multiple times in the lipid list.");
102                }
103                keys.add(test_lipid_name);
104            }
105
106            String enum_name = tokens.get(0);
107            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
108            for (int i = 0; i < enum_name.length(); ++i) {
109                char c = enum_name.charAt(i);
110                if ('A' <= c && c <= 'Z') {
111                    sb.append(c);
112                } else if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
113                    sb.append(c);
114                } else if ('a' <= c && c <= 'z') {
115                    sb.append(Character.toString(c - ('a' - 'A')));
116                } else {
117                    sb.append('_');
118                }
119            }
120            enum_name = sb.toString();
121
122            if (enum_name.charAt(0) == '_') {
123                enum_name = "L" + enum_name;
124            }
125
126            if (enum_name.charAt(0) < 'A' || 'Z' < enum_name.charAt(0)) {
127                enum_name = "L" + enum_name;
128            }
129
130            if (!enum_names.containsKey(enum_name)) {
131                enum_names.put(enum_name, 1);
132            } else {
133                int cnt = enum_names.get(enum_name) + 1;
134                enum_names.put(enum_name, cnt);
135                enum_name += ('A' + cnt - 1);
136                enum_names.put(enum_name, 1);
137            }
138
139            data.put(enum_name, tokens);
140        }
141
142        // creating the lipid class dictionary
143        BaseParserEventHandler<ElementTable> handler = sfp.newEventHandler();
144        data.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
145            HashSet<String> special_cases = new HashSet<>();
146            StringFunctions.splitString(kv.getValue().get(5), ';', '"').forEach(scase -> {
147                special_cases.add(StringFunctions.strip(scase, '"'));
148            });
149            ElementTable e = kv.getValue().get(6).length() > 0 ? sfp.parse(kv.getValue().get(6), handler) : new ElementTable();
150            ArrayList<String> synonyms = new ArrayList<>();
151            synonyms.add(kv.getValue().get(0));
152            for (int ii = SYNONYM_START_INDEX; ii < kv.getValue().size(); ++ii) {
153                if (kv.getValue().get(ii).length() > 0) {
154                    synonyms.add(StringFunctions.strip(kv.getValue().get(ii), '"'));
155                }
156            }
157            add(new LipidClassMeta(names_to_category.get(kv.getValue().get(1)),
158                    kv.getValue().get(0),
159                    kv.getValue().get(2),
160                    Integer.valueOf(kv.getValue().get(3)),
161                    Integer.valueOf(kv.getValue().get(4)),
162                    special_cases,
163                    e,
164                    synonyms));
165        });
166    }
167
168    public static LipidClasses getInstance() {
169        return LIPID_CLASSES;
170    }
171}
